name: .PC6 File Extension
summary: Learn about .PC6 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Drawing file created with PowerCADD 6, a Macintosh CAD program; may contain architectural designs, floor plans, machinery assemblies, or 2D drawings.

content: NOTE: PowerCADD may not add the ".pc6" file extension by default, but it may be added by the user.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
